Player History
Earned first career win on 4/15/1965...
Had first career hit on 5/15/1967, off Bill f Henry (BOS)...
Injured on 5/29/1968 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/18/1968 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 9/17/1968 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1970, winning 2 games with a 1.13 ERA...
Injured on 8/6/1970 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/20/1971 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/1971 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Injured on 6/4/1973 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1976 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/21/1976 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/29/1977 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1979 to a minor league contract.
